name: BBC micro:bit
description: Connect to a BBC micro:bit device over Bluetooth and access its features.

conditions.name: Is supported
conditions.description: True if the current platform supports Bluetooth features.

conditions.name: On device connected
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Request device' successfully connects to a device.

conditions.name: On device disconnected
conditions.description: Triggered when a connected device disconnects and is no longer accessible.

conditions.name: Is device connected
conditions.description: Test if any device is currently connected.

conditions.name: On request device failed
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Request device' if the user cancels or connecting to a device failed.

conditions.name: On accelerometer reading
conditions.description: Triggered when an accelerometer reading is received from the device.

conditions.name: On button pressed
conditions.description: Triggered when one of the buttons on the device is pressed.

params.name: Button
params.description: Which button to detect input from.

params.name: Input
params.description: The type of input to detect.

conditions.name: On bearing reading
conditions.description: Triggered when a bearing reading is received from the device.

conditions.name: On temperature reading
conditions.description: Triggered when a temperature reading is received from the device.

actions.name: Request device
actions.description: Request access to a BBC micro:bit device over Bluetooth. Must be used in a user input trigger.

actions.name: Clear LED state
actions.description: Reset the stored LED state, so all LEDs are off.

actions.name: Set LED state
actions.description: Set whether an individual LED is on or off in the stored LED state.

params.name: Column
params.description: The zero-based column of the LED, from 0-4.

params.name: Row
params.description: The zero-based row of the LED, from 0-4.

params.name: State
params.description: Whether the LED is on or off.

actions.name: Update LEDs
actions.description: Update the LEDs on the device to the stored LED state.

actions.name: Scroll text
actions.description: Show a message on the LED display.

params.name: Text
params.description: The message to display, up to 20 characters.

expressions.name: DeviceID
expressions.description: The ID of a connected device (if any).

expressions.name: Bearing
expressions.description: The magnetometer bearing reading, in degrees from due north.

expressions.name: Temperature
expressions.description: The temperature reading, in degrees celcius.
